# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
Security fixes are provided for supported release lines defined in the project README and CHANGELOG.

## Reporting a Vulnerability
Submit a private report to the security contact listed in the README.
Include impact, reproduction details, and any suggested mitigations.

## Disclosure Process
Reports are triaged within standard operating timelines, remediations are tracked privately, and coordinated disclosure is handled with affected stakeholders.
